name: SUPER STRESS-OUT
description:
PERSONAL SPACE: ONE WAY OR THE OTHER!

WARNING: You're in a business meeting and super stressed out! Time to regain some personal space, get away from the stuff that's bothering you and change your life for the better!

Best with 2 players. Whoever gets the furthest away from their problems is the winner of the match.

Controls

Requires controllers with analog sticks for proper limb wiggles and to-the-man-sticking! Use your analogue sticks to show 'em what's what.

Credits

Jukio Kallio (code)
Dominik Johann (art)
Maria Rathjen (game design)
Martin Jonasson (voice acting)

Made for Nordic Game Jam 2014 (theme: “privacy”) in Copenhagen, Denmark in 48 hours. Check out the video on the right to look at our jam progress.
